summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: If you can have the Spurs number nine for seven and a half million, it's the perfect third forward.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: We've got a personal interest in the podcast and it does feel like a template front three is forming.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Oscar Bob has been excellent in preseason and should get the nod for game week one.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Oscar Bob has played 92% of the minutes in preseason, scoring two goals and providing three assists.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: I'm not worried about Haaland even though he didn't score in the Community Shield.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Haaland has a great record in the opening games of previous seasons.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Garnacho looks like United's biggest threat going forward.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Garnacho is priced well and should start, making him a good investment.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Itâ€™s either Salah or bust for my team right now.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: It's a struggle for many of us to fit Salah into the team.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Diogo Jota is looking like a really nice alternative if you can't fit Salah into your budget.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Jota is a top option for Liverpool with a good fixture and solid form.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Eze will be talismanic for Palace this season without Alise.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Eze is still a viable option as he is expected to shoulder more responsibilities this season.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I was not convinced by Rashford's performance, he missed key chances.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Rashford is priced well, but on watch for now due to poor finishing.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Isak is looking like a strong captain option for the opening games.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Isak could be a solid pick due to his finished form.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: I believe Smith Rowe will be a good pick due to his prior performance at Arsenal.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Smith Rowe looks promising at Fulham with low ownership.
